text: Bill Dalkin (15 November 1921 – 27 November 1988) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood and Hawthorn in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1988 deaths Category:1921 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Hawthorn Football Club players
title: Bill Dalkin
